name: Racin Drift
description:
Racing game with some maps where you can put all your driving skills on the test.

This game is made in an arcade genre, so you should not expect any twisted plot. However, this game still has something to show...

Also, this is my first big project and it is still in development, so some bugs are not excluded.

By the way, you should get used to the way cars are moving here :)

Good Luck!
